quotes.text: We look around us and we find ourselves confused as to why the world has fallen into such deep darkness. quotes.text: The character of Jesus is the character of God. God would never do something Jesus would find morally reprehensible, so if you can't find it in Jesus, then you really ought to think twice before you claim you've found it in God.

quotes.text: Christians walk as strangers in the world: They are untamed. They are free. To persevere with love, yet untamed by man, is often what leaves that open space for divine revelation when God so wills.

quotes.text: Humans have free will but God is always a handy one to blame because He is the one who sits on the throne. He is the one who allows or does not allow things to happen. He will gladly take the blame because He knows that someday you will understand and forgive everything.

quotes.text: While humans play God, dogs learn from their masters.

quotes.text: All what we think and know is an illusion. Nothing exists. Everything is an opinion.

quotes.text: Today I wonder why it is God refers to Himself as 'Father' at all. This, to me, in light of the earthly representation of the role, seems a marketing mistake.

quotes.text: This most beautiful system of the sun, planets and comets, could only proceed from the counsel and dominion of an intelligent and powerful Being.
quotes.author: Isaac Newton

quotes.text: I want to help you to grow as beautiful as God meant you to be when He thought of you first.
quotes.author: George MacDonald

quotes.text: The glory of Christianity is to conquer by forgiveness.

quotes.text: Sometimes 'œno' is the most loving, gentle answer God can give.

quotes.text: Before you came into my life, I believed that God had abandoned me. Now I know that He has blessed me beyond measure. ~Sir Bannor
quotes.author: Teresa Medeiros

quotes.text: I once listened to an Indian on television say that God was in the wind and the water, and I wondered at how beautiful that was because it meant you could swim in Him or have Him brush your face in a breeze.
quotes.author: Donald Miller

quotes.text: We are all butterflies. Earth is our chrysalis.
quotes.author: LeeAnn Taylor

quotes.text: Gift better than Himself God doth not know,Gift better than God no man can see;This gift doth here the giver given bestowGift to this gift let each receiver be;God is my gift, Himself He freely gave me,God's gift am I, and none but God shall have me.
quotes.author: Robert Southwell

quotes.text: If we cannot comprehend God in his visible works, how then in his inconceivable thoughts, that call the works into being?

quotes.text: There is beauty and majesty in God's remaining disappeared!
quotes.author: Md. Ziaul Haque

quotes.text: Spirituality cannot be taught;its something very personal that you can experience for yourself. You may give spirit a name- Soul, Light, God, Universe, or even Nothingness- but each of us has to define who we are and what we believe to be spiritual according to our own understanding.
quotes.author: Angela Jamal

quotes.text: Our identity rests in God's relentless tenderness for us revealed in Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Brennan Manning

quotes.text: Becuse God loves us, but the devil takes an interest.
quotes.author: Jennifer Donnelly

quotes.text: God is the reason I'm surviving, but he's sure used you in my life wonderfully. I love you.
quotes.author: Esther Earl

quotes.text: Praise be to God, Who has so disposed matters that pleasant literary anecdotes may serve as an instrument for the polishing of wits and the cleansing of rust from our hearts.
quotes.author: Ahmad AlTifashi

quotes.text: Spending time with God is the key to our strength and success in all areas of life. Be sure that you never try to work God into your schedule, but always work your schedule around Him.

quotes.text: Without a spiritual wakefulness to divine purposes and connections in all things, we will not know things for what they truly are.

quotes.text: The phenomenally improbable message of Christmas is that everything that we were convinced was a defeat is in fact a victory in the making.

quotes.text: To have found God and still to pursue Him is the soul's paradox of love.
quotes.author: A.W. Tozer

quotes.text: Anything invested outside of God replaces him

quotes.text: When a child is given to his parents, a crown is made for that child in Heaven, and woe to the parents who raise a child without consciousness of that eternal crown!

quotes.text: In essence I find that the foundation of modern conservatism is driven by a clinging to God in fear of the world, whereas the foundation of modern liberalism is a clinging to the world in fear of God; albeit, the true foundation should be one's clinging to God in fear of God.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.text: God is only as strong as your belief in him.
quotes.author: Sachin Kumar Puli

quotes.text: ...I believe in a God of scandalous grace. I have pledged allegiance to a King who loved evildoers so much he died for them, teaching us that there is something worth dying for but nothing worth killing for.
quotes.author: Shane Claiborne

quotes.text: God's creatures who cried themselves to sleep stirred to cry again.

quotes.text: We will never be happy until we make God the source of our fulfillment and the answer to our longings. He is the only one who should have power over our souls.

quotes.text: Make peace with silence, and remind yourself that it is in this space that you'll come to remember your spirit. When you're able to transcend an aversion to silence, you'll also transcend many other miseries. And it is in this silence that the remembrance of God will be activated.

quotes.text: To understand the interior relationship between God and man as a drama of freely-given love is to lay bare the sources of history
quotes.author: Nikolai Berdyaev

quotes.text: The story goes that a public sinner was excommunicated and forbidden entry to the church. He took his woes to God. 'They won't let me in, Lord, because I am a sinner.''What are you complaining about?' said God. 'They won't let Me in either.

quotes.text: If a man cannot serve two masters, neither can Christianity, or several thousand of them as the case may be.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.text: It is now generally admitted, at any rate by philosophers, that the existence of a being having the attributes which define the god of any non-animistic religion cannot be demonstratively proved... [A]ll utterances about the nature of God are nonsensical.

quotes.text: The best proof that He will never cease to love us lies in that He never began.

quotes.text: The more I know about God, I am convinced He likes to read books and authors are His librarians. Every soul is a story waiting to be read.

quotes.text: When you saw a wounded who cry out for help,you may be the one sent by God to bring a favor.

quotes.text: He was a wise man who invented God.

quotes.text: A sunset is the end of a day now passed. Yet, for some reason we get caught in the reality of the descending dark verses the anticipation of a rising dawn.

quotes.text: The moment you fear God, He is not God!

quotes.text: The world as it is is the world as God sees it, not as we see it. Our vision is distorted, not so much by the limits of finitude as by sin and ignorance. But the more we raise ourselves in the scale of being, the more will our ideas about God and the world correspond to reality.

quotes.text: For the happy man prayer is only a jumble of words, until the day when sorrow comes to explain to him the sublime language by means of which he speaks to God.

quotes.text: A friend once said, and I found to be true,That everyday people, they lie to God too,So what makes you think, that they won't lie to you.

quotes.text: God doesn't bless us just to make us happy; He blesses us to make us a blessing.

quotes.text: The glory of God is as destructive of evil as it is creative of good.

quotes.text: Owners of dogs will have noticed that, if you provide them with food and water and shelter and affection, they will think you are god. Whereas owners of cats are compelled to realize that, if you provide them with food and water and shelter and affection, they draw the conclusion that they are gods.

quotes.text: The most boring and unproductive question one can ask of any religion is whether or not it is true.
quotes.author: Alain de Botton

quotes.text: God's only excuse is that he does not exist

quotes.text: ... one flaw throws the loveliness of [everything else] into focus. I remember reading that Shakers deliberately introduced a mistake into the things they made, to show that man shouldn't aspire to the perfection of God. Flawed can be more perfect than perfection.

quotes.text: God looked on God, as ghosts meet in the night.

quotes.text: Behavior is the substance of religion. Belief is the substance of relationship.

quotes.text: God is not willing to do everything, and thus take away our free will and that share of glory which belongs to us.

quotes.text: Deliver thunder, GodIf you choose not to talk.

quotes.text: It is just as crazy not to be crazy about Christ as it is to be crazy about anything else.

quotes.text: The Bible is the greatest of all books; to study it is the noblest of all pursuits; to understand it, the highest of all goals.

quotes.text: You are someone who is different, but who wants to be the same as everyone else. And that in my view is a serious illness. God chose you to be different. Why are you disappointing God with this kind of attitude?

quotes.text: We are not on this planet to ask forgiveness of our deities

quotes.text: I incessantly wallow in the '˜muck and mire' of the terrible messes that I have made. And when I realize that God has long ago removed all the '˜muck and mire,' I suddenly understand that the only wallowing that's going on is in my head.

quotes.text: God sleeps in the rock, dreams in the plant, stirs in the animal, and awakens in man.

quotes.text: The way to freedom is not with force but with love. Do not fight the world. Do not battle it. Forgive it. Then move towards the freedom that can only be found in God

quotes.text: ONE BUT MANYOne God, many faces.One family, many races.One truth, many paths.One heart, many complexions.One light, many reflections.One world, many imperfections.ONE.We are all one,But many.

quotes.text: They all laughed, except Tyr; he lost his hand.

quotes.text: (on forgiveness) Didn't he and I stand together before an all seeing God convicted of the same murder? For I had murdered him with my heart and my tongue.

quotes.text: Jesus was born in a borrowed barn, he was buried in a borrowed tomb, and in-between it all he borrowed mankind's sin with the intent of never returning it.

quotes.text: For he who loves God without faith reflects on himself, while the person who loves God in faith reflects on God.

quotes.text: In Rwanda, one person's God is another person's Satan-ThÃƒ©rÃƒ¨se Nyirabayovu

quotes.text: ... The power which the common people ascribe to God is not only a human power (which shows that they look upon God as a man, or as being like a man), but that it also involves weakness.

quotes.text: My soul doth magnify the Lord,And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Savior.

quotes.text: All beings exist and nothing elseAnd that's why they're called beings

quotes.text: Once we are a creation, how much absurdity can there be in our heart without God the Creator.

quotes.text: God's father heart is open to all who would come. and to all who would have an open heart.~Cam Richmond~

quotes.text: Prayer is an insurance policy that you can never lapse on.

quotes.text: ...a God that did everything we thought was right and good wouldn't be the creator of the universe. He would be our puppet.

quotes.text: If Christmas is not everything that it says it is, neither is anything else.

quotes.text: God is love, and he who abides in love abides in God, and God in him.

quotes.text: I tried to believe that there is a God, who created each of us in His own image and likeness, loves us very much, and keeps a close eye on things. I really tried to believe that, but I gotta tell you, the longer you live, the more you look around, the more you realize, something is fucked up.

quotes.text: We are nearer to him than his jugular vein.

quotes.text: We are living in the falsehood due to the erroneous teachings of the society, community and the bordered nations.

quotes.text: Decision decides destiny. What God wants you to become is the positive person you decide to become when led by God's spirit.

quotes.text: Frankly speaking, I could care less if my plans succeed. However, I do care if God's plans do. Therefore, none of myself and all of God is the plan.

quotes.text: The sight of her made him understand why he'd lost his faith in God.

quotes.text: Was I sorry that I chose to come by hand cart? No. Neither then nor any minute of my life since. The price we paid to become acquainted with God was a privilege to pay and I am thankful that I was privileged to come in the Martin Hand Cart Company.

quotes.text: You got a God. Don't make no difference if you don' know what he looks like.

quotes.text: First knowledge is the knowledge of God.

quotes.text: 25 And the Lord spake unto the Angel that guarded the eastern gate, saying 'Where is the flaming sword that was given unto thee?'26 And the Angel said, 'I had it here only a moment ago, I must have put it down some where, forget my own head next.'27 And the Lord did not ask him again.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett

quotes.text: ...the sorrows God sent us brought comfort and strength with them, while the sorrows we brought on ourselves, through folly or wickedness, were by far the hardest to bear.

quotes.text: God is only a word dreamed up to explain the world

quotes.text: My arms are too short to box with God.

quotes.text: We can see that sin is simply anything that disrupts the way life is intended to be. Sometimes we are the ones who do the disrupting; sometimes it's done to us. But never does sin become part of our identity. We are created in the image and likeness of love, and nothing can destroy that.

quotes.text: God's ways are higher than our ways not because he is less compassionate than we are but because he is more compassionate than we can ever imagine.

quotes.text: Theology is a distinctly rare, a puzzling study, given that its practitioners are happiest when the terms of their discovery fall well short of their projected point; this is where they likely glimpse their proof.

quotes.text: There is an old joke that went around- it goes, in the beginning God made man in His own image, and since the fall, man has been seeking to return the compliment.

quotes.text: Aia is the reason we are free.

quotes.text: The whole universe is sum up in the Human Being. Devil is not a monster waiting to trap us, He is a voice inside. Look for Your Devil in Yourself, not in the Others. Don't forgeT that the one who knows his Devil, knows his God.

quotes.text: I saw my real gods . . the gods of most men. Food, drink, and security in conformity.

quotes.text: God is a circle whose center is everywhere, and its circumference nowhere.

quotes.text: You can con God and get away with it, Granny said, if you do so with charm and wit. If you live your life with imagination and verve, God will play along just to see what outrageously entertaining thing you'll do next.

quotes.text: I must not, like the quietists, reduce all religion to a denial of any specific action, despising all other means, since what makes perfection is God's order, and the means he ordains is best for the soul.

quotes.text: If you don't live right with God by WALKING IN THE LIGHT, a deceptive will ever so slowly creep in to your life. This slow, seemingly insignificant drift will cause you to end up with 'the spirit of religion', whilst all along thinking you are right with God.
quotes.author: Mike Gorrie

quotes.text: Though the ancient poet in Plutarch tells us we must not trouble the gods with our affairs because they take no heed of our angers and disputes, we can never enough decry the disorderly sallies of our minds.

quotes.text: Let every man abide in the calling wherein he is called and his work will be as sacred as the work of the ministry. It is not what a man does that determines whether his work is sacred or secular, it is why he does it.

quotes.text: [When it comes to God] We can't run out of second chances...only time.

quotes.text: I talk to God but the sky is empty.

quotes.text: If you can change the way you think in time you will notice a change in your heart and also a change in your life and the way you see things.
quotes.author: The Prolific Penman

quotes.text: Choose to view life through God's eyes.

quotes.text: I would rather die by my convictions than die by the culture that defies them.

quotes.text: I can only imagine how happy life would be if we could stay so grounded in our faith that we would never waver in our positive attitudes.

quotes.text: I believe that water is the closest thing to a god we have here on Earth. We are in awe of its power and majestic beauty. We are drawn to it as if it's a magical, healing force. We gestate in water, are made of water, and need to drink water to live. We are living in water.

quotes.text: They call him Aslan in That Place," said Eustace."What a curious name!""Not half so curious as himself," said Eustace solemnly.

quotes.text: With life. Rooter says that life is how God gives purpose to the universe.

quotes.text: When there are no animals left, who will dress up like a zebra?Who will don the fur of a lion to show our kids?Who will dress up as god so they can show what man wanted to be?Who will show their children what life used to be?

quotes.text: God is the color of water. Water doesn't have a color.

quotes.text: Faith, in its most correct form, never removes responsibility; it removes fear of responsibility. The results are complete opposites with the greater saying, 'God's will is my delight.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.text: Some of the most beautiful things we have in life comes from our mistakes.
quotes.author: Surgeo Bell

quotes.text: Ours is an illusionless humanism that cares about protecting our species, especially from itself. We must forgive humanity, and ourselves, for being what we are '“ neither angels nor beasts...

quotes.text: When we look for success, it should be for the sole purpose of boasting sincerely in Christ. There's no other reason for it. Success is only worth it when the more intense it gets for you, the more you find yourself bragging for his glory rather than your own.

quotes.text: Am I as spontaneously kind to God as I used to be, or am I only expecting God to be kind to me? Am I full of the little things that cheer His heart over me, or am I whimpering because things are going hardly with me? There is no joy in the soul that has forgotten what God prizes.

quotes.text: As far as you know, and that is not near enough, this is the only life given to you. So, do not screw it up. Do your bit, without harming others. That's godly enough. Just do not dump your shit, especially the religious kind, on others. Thank you.
quotes.author: Fakeer Ishavardas

quotes.text: Cynicism places the cynic at the center seat of judgement with the self appointed authority to criticize and condemn.
quotes.author: Jayce O'Neal

quotes.text: I would put myself in the attitude to look in the eye an abstract truth, and I cannot. I blench and withdraw on this side and on that. I seem to know what he meant who said, No man can see God face to face and live.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: He's not safe, but he's good (referring to Aslan, the Lion, in The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe)
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.text: God made everything out of nothing. But the nothingness shows through.
quotes.author: Paul ValÃƒÂ©ry

quotes.text: Even a God finds it hard to love and be wise at the same time.
quotes.author: Tina Smith

quotes.text: Do you know why God loves the world? Because the world is not apart from God and it would be impossible for God to not love himself.
quotes.author: Edward Weiss

quotes.text: There's no need to curse God if you're an ugly duckling. He chooses those strong enough to endure it so that they can guide others who've felt the same.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.text: By the end of the war, I could pick out Jewish people almost as if I had a sixth sense about it, even if they had blue eyes and blond hair. I would have been a very valuable Gestapo person.
quotes.author: Diet Eman

quotes.text: We need to abandon our scale and adopt God's because our misguided labels keep us from the right kind of interaction with people.
quotes.author: Judah Smith

quotes.text: Throughout our lifetime many people come '˜to' us. But if they haven't come '˜for' us the coming doesn't matter. And I would have us carefully consider that Christmas is God perfectly doing both.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.text: I know there is only oneGovernorOfDeities.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.text: Cosmos is God, who whispered the syllable of life.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic
